name: BlunderBall
description:
A 2D platformer. Use Arrows to move and Space to jump and (sort of) wall jump. Also, you are carrying a big metal ball. Good luck.

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021: Joined together.

The most direct interpretation is to just physically join something to the player but who has the balls to do something like that? I do, and maybe you too. After playing around with the mechanic of chaining the player with a ball I decided to make it something like a rage game a la Bennets Foddy's "Get over it". So don't expect a walk in the park.
